sailpoint.web.certification

Class CertificationItemBean.ProfileBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.web.PageCodeBase
      • sailpoint.web.BaseBean
        • sailpoint.web.certification.CertificationItemBean
          • sailpoint.web.certification.CertificationItemBean.ProfileBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.faces.component.StateHolder, sailpoint.web.UserContext
    Enclosing class:
    CertificationItemBean

    public static class CertificationItemBean.ProfileBean
extends CertificationItemBean
    UI bean which exposed the properties of a given profile under certification. Used to populate profile details expando in business role compositions certifications.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProfileBean

        public ProfileBean()
        Default constructor

      • ProfileBean

        public ProfileBean(sailpoint.web.BaseBean bean,
                   CertificationItem item,
                   CertificationEntity entity,
                   java.lang.String workItem)
            throws GeneralException
        Creates a new instance given the objects required to retrieve the profile details.
        Parameters:
        bean - The BaseBean creating this profile bean.
        item - The certification item for this profile.
        entity - The certification entity for this profile. Represents the parent business role.
        workItem - The ID of the work item in which this profile is being viewed. If null, the profile is being viewed from within the certification.
        Throws:
        GeneralException
